panels.title: Violations by Guard
panels.queryString: _sourceCategory=*/security/clawdstrike | json "decision.guard" as guard, "decision.allowed" as allowed | where allowed = "false" | count by guard

panels.title: Event Timeline
panels.queryString: _sourceCategory=*/security/clawdstrike | json "decision.allowed" as allowed | timeslice 5m | count by _timeslice, allowed

panels.title: Top Blocked Resources
panels.queryString: _sourceCategory=*/security/clawdstrike | json "decision.allowed" as allowed, "resource.name" as resource | where allowed = "false" | count by resource | top 10 resource
